definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be crafty, deceitful, knavish (As. nakâlu, be crafty, cunning; Targum [[נְכֵל]] be crafty, Pa. deceive; Syr. nkel deceive, plot; cf. perh. wanajal: act faithlessly, wanagel: faithless, Prä:Amhar. Spr. 90);—

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 mpl. c. acc. cogn. [[נִכְלֵיהֶם אֲשֶׁר נִכְּלוּ לָכֶם]] Nu 25:18 their wiles with which they beguiled you.

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: Impf. [[וַיִּתְנַכְּלוּ אׂתוֹ לַהֲמִיתוֹ]] Ge 37:18 they knavishly planned against him (Kö:iii. 9), etc.; Inf. cstr. [[לְחִתְנַכֵּל בְ]] Ps 105:25 to deal knavishly with.
